description.narrative: Models for inclusive education for children with disabilities in primary school formulated, tested and validated., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 all children with a focus on the most disadvantaged, are reached by effective public policies and programmes in health, education, and social protection

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Models for inclusive education for children with disabilities in primary school formulated, tested and validated.

description.narrative: The Mandela network of inclusive schools grew to 80 and UNICEF began its evaluation. However, the percentage of all children attending special schools has not shown a relevant decrease. To ensure better integration of migrant children, UNICEF adapted a toolkit for teachers and is documenting local best practices. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2020

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of curricula and support from teachers and school administrators that are inclusive of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
